summary: Apex Predator of Logistics Efficiency: 15+ years orchestrating complex systems, deconstructing inefficiencies, and re-architecting for maximum output. Dual-core expertise in Logistics Management and IT Automation.

bullets: Architected and deployed internal automation tools using Python and Selenium, reducing manual administrative time by 40%
Implemented secure API authentication protocols (JWT/Okta) to protect sensitive driver and route data
Developed 'Apache Genie,' a Python-based CLI tool to automate server deployment and diagnostics
Executed high-volume, last-mile delivery operations, maintaining a 4.9+ performance rating through route optimization and superior customer service
Leveraged local geographic knowledge to navigate complex delivery windows and solve on-road logistical challenges in real-time
Orchestrated logistics for a high-volume agricultural shipper, managing a fleet of 20+ drivers and 60+ daily outbound shipments
Identified systemic bottlenecks in the manual scheduling process; designed and implemented a custom scheduling system, reducing downtime by 30% and improving fleet utilization

education: Associate of Science in Computer Science (In Progress), Modesto Junior College, Modesto, CA
